com.mambu.apisdk.services

Class SavingsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mambu.apisdk.services.SavingsService

  • public class SavingsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class which handles API operations like retrieval, creation or changing state of savings accounts. See full Mambu Savings API documentation at http://api.mambu.com/customer/portal/articles/1162285-savings-api?b_id=874
    Author:
    ipenciuc

      • getSavingsAccountTransactions

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction> getSavingsAccountTransactions(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                       java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                       java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                                throws MambuApiException
        Get Savings Account Transactions by an account id and offset and limit
        Parameters:
        accountId - the id of the account
        offset - first transaction number
        limit - last transaction number Note: if offset and limit both equal null, all transactions are returned (Note: transaction are sorted by date)
        Returns:
        the list of savings transactions
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getSavingsTransactions

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction> getSavingsTransactions(com.mambu.api.server.handler.core.dynamicsearch.model.JSONFilterConstraints filterConstraints,
                                                                                                java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                         throws MambuApiException
        Get savings transactions by specifying filter constraints
        Parameters:
        filterConstraints - filter constraints. Must not be null
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        list of savings transactions matching filter constraints
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • applyFeeToSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction applyFeeToSavingsAccount(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                  java.util.List<com.mambu.loans.shared.model.CustomPredefinedFee> fees,
                                                                                  java.lang.String notes)
                                                                           throws MambuApiException
        Apply Predefined Fee to to a savings account
        Parameters:
        accountId - the id or the encoded key of the account. Must not be null
        fees - fees. Only Manual Predefined Fees are currently supported. Must not be null. Must contain exactly one fee. Note: Once MBU-12865 is implemented this method will support both predefined fees and arbitrary fees and the (@link #applyFeeToLoanAccount(String, String, String, String)} method used for arbitrary fees can be deprecated
        notes - transaction notes
        Returns:
        Savings Transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • executeJSONTransactionRequest

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction executeJSONTransactionRequest(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                       com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransactionType transactionType,
                                                                                       com.mambu.api.server.handler.loan.model.JSONTransactionRequest transactionRequest)
                                                                                throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to execute Savings Account transaction by providing JSONTransactionRequest
        Parameters:
        accountId - account id or encoded key. Must not be null
        transactionType - savings transaction type. Must not be null. Supported types are: FEE_APPLIED, DEPOSIT and WITHDRAWAL
        transactionRequest - JSON transaction request
        Returns:
        savings transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • reverseSavingsTransaction

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction reverseSavingsTransaction(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                   com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransactionType originalTransactionType,
                                                                                   java.lang.String originalTransactionId,
                                                                                   java.lang.String notes)
                                                                            throws MambuApiException
        Reverse savings transactions for a savings account
        Parameters:
        accountId - the id of the savings account. Mandatory
        originalTransactionType - Original transaction type to be reversed. The following transaction types can be reversed: DEPOSIT, WITHDRAWAL, TRANSFER, FEE. Mandatory.
        originalTransactionId - the id or the encodedKey of the transaction to be reversed. Mandatory
        notes - transaction notes
        Returns:
        Savings Transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • reverseSavingsTransaction

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction reverseSavingsTransaction(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsTransaction originalTransaction,
                                                                                   java.lang.String notes)
                                                                            throws MambuApiException
        Reverse transaction for a savings account by providing the original savings transaction
        Parameters:
        originalTransaction - The following transactions can be reversed: DEPOSIT, WITHDRAWAL and TRANSFER. Mandatory.
        notes - transaction notes
        Returns:
        Savings Transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • closeSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount closeSavingsAccount(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                         APIData.CLOSER_TYPE closerType,
                                                                         java.lang.String notes)
                                                                  throws MambuApiException
        Close Savings account specifying the type of closer (withdraw, reject or close) Note: available since Mambu 3.4 See MBU-4581 and MBU-10976 for details.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the id of the account to withdraw. Must not be null
        closerType - type of closer (withdraw, reject or close). Must not be null
        notes - optional notes
        Returns:
        savings account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • startMaturity

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount startMaturity(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                   java.util.Date date,
                                                                   java.lang.String notes)
                                                            throws MambuApiException
        Starts maturity for a saving account. (A transaction will be created and posted into Mambu in order to accomplish this) Example: POST "{"type":"START_MATURITY", "notes":"123", "date":"2017-01-12"}" /api/savings/{ID}/transactions/
        Parameters:
        accountId - The id of the saving account that maturity will be started for. Must not be NULL.
        date - The date used to indicate when the maturity starts.
        notes - Some notes that will be posted on the transaction that will be created for starting the maturity for the account.
        Returns:
        the SavingAccount the maturity was started for
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • undoCloseSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount undoCloseSavingsAccount(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount savingsAccount,
                                                                             java.lang.String notes)
                                                                      throws MambuApiException
        Undo Close Savings account. Supports UNDO_REJECT, UNDO_WITHDRAWN, UNDO_CLOSE
        Parameters:
        savingsAccount - closed savings account. Must not be null and must be in one of the supported closed states.
        notes - undo closer reason notes
        Returns:
        savings account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getSavingsAccountsByBranchCentreOfficerState

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount> getSavingsAccountsByBranchCentreOfficerState(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String centreId,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String accountState,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                                           throws MambuApiException
        Get the Savings accounts by branch id, centreId, credit officer, accountState
        Parameters:
        branchId - The ID of the branch to which the accounts are assigned to
        centreId - The ID of the centre to which the loan accounts are assigned to. If both branchId and centreId are provided then this centre must be assigned to the branchId
        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the accounts are assigned to
        accountState - the state of the accounts to filter on (e.g: APPROVED)
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Savings accounts matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getSavingsAccountsByBranchOfficerState

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount> getSavingsAccountsByBranchOfficerState(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String accountState,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
        Get the Savings accounts by branch id, credit officer, accountState
        Parameters:
        branchId - The ID of the branch to which the accounts are assigned to provided then this centre must be assigned to the branchId
        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the accounts are assigned to
        accountState - the state of the accounts to filter on (e.g: APPROVED)
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Savings accounts matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • createSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount createSavingsAccount(com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount jsonSavingsAccount)
                                                                                   throws MambuApiException
        Create new SavingsAccount using JSONSavingsAccount object and sending it via the JSON API. This API allows creating SavingsAccount with details, including creating custom field values.
        Parameters:
        jsonSavingsAccount - JSONSavingsAccount object containing SavingsAccount. Must be not null. SavingsAccount's encodedKey must be null for account create
        Returns:
        created JSONSavingsAccount
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • createSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount createSavingsAccount(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount savingsAccount)
                                                                   throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to create new SavingsAccount using SavingsAccount object.
        Parameters:
        savingsAccount - SavingsAccount object. Must not be null. SavingsAccount's encodedKey must be null for account create
        Returns:
        created savings account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • updateSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount updateSavingsAccount(com.mambu.api.server.handler.savings.model.JSONSavingsAccount jsonSavingsAccount)
                                                                                   throws MambuApiException
        Update an existent SavingsAccount using JSONSavingsAccount object and sending it via the JSON API. This API allows updating JSONSavingsAccount with details. As of Mambu 3.4 only custom fields can be updated.
        Parameters:
        jsonSavingsAccount - JSONSavingsAccount object containing SavingsAccount. SavingsAccount encodedKey or id must be NOT null for account update
        Returns:
        updated JSONSavingsAccount
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • updateSavingsAccount

        public com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount updateSavingsAccount(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount savingsAccount)
                                                                   throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to Update an existent SavingsAccount. As of Mambu 3.4 only custom fields can be updated.
        Parameters:
        savingsAccount - savings account object to be updated. Must not be null. SavingsAccount encodedKey or id must be NOT null for account update
        Returns:
        savingsAccount
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • patchSavingsAccount

        public boolean patchSavingsAccount(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount savings)
                            throws MambuApiException
        Update savings terms for an existent savings account This API allows updating SavingsAccount terms only. Use updateSavingsAccount() to update custom fields for a savings account
        Parameters:
        savings - SavingsAccount object. Either account's encoded key or its ID must be NOT null for updating account Note that only some savings terms can be updated. As of Mambu 3.14 the following fields can be updated: interestRate, maxWidthdrawlAmount, recommendedDepositAmount, targetAmount, overdraftInterestSpread, overdraftLimit, overdraftExpiryDate. See MBU-10447 for more details
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getFundedLoanAccounts

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.loans.shared.model.LoanAccount> getFundedLoanAccounts(java.lang.String savingsId)
                                                                               throws MambuApiException
        Get all loan accounts funded by a deposit investor account
        Parameters:
        savingsId - encoded key or an id of an investor funding savings account. Must not be null
        Returns:
        all loan accounts funded by the deposit account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
